name: Single Trooper Aerial Platform
Lore: 'STAPs are used by infantry battle droids to provide a variety of rangebased advantages on the battlefield.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot. May move as a ''react''. When piloted by a battle droid, vehicle and pilot are immune to attrition < 4. Pilot''s power = 0. If lost, character aboard may ''jump off'' (disembark).',
